MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Broad Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.11am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.06pm on 29th October 2020.
